EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance! [Webinar] Get There: Building a Better Digital-First Bank
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Do you have a digital-first strategy? If not, you may be at risk for declining deposits and rising attrition. We know that establishing a digital-first approach to banking can be complex. So, we’re bringing together industry experts to provide guidance on what to consider and how to get there. Join The Financial Brand’s Jim Marous, Synovus’ Liz Wolverton and NCR’s Doug Brown to gain critical insights on building a better digital-first financial institution. What you’ll learn:  - Why digital-first banking is so critical—and how to get there - How to balance convenience & experience vs. security & protection - The steps for establishing a digital-first culture at all levels - What the future looks like for fintech, neobanks and crypto We hope you’ll join us.
